 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרֵעַ‎</span>] **noun masculine** ==friend, companion== (strange formation; origin dubious; [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>Syr. Dreschtafel, Z. Ethnol. 1873, 289</sup> compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***miryâ***, name of bell-wether among Syrian nomads (properly [inseparable] ***companion***), and derived from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ריע ֗֗֗ ‎</span>, properly ***closely joined***; compare [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>97, 162</sup>); — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרֵעֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Gen.26.26|Gen 26:26]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרֵעֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[Prov.19.7|Prov 19:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרֵעֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Judg.15.2|Judg 15:2]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרֵעִים‎</span> [[Judg.14.11|Judg 14:11]] — ***companion, confidential friend***, [[Gen.26.26|Gen 26:26]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵעֶה‎</span>); of bridegroom's escort [[Gen.14.11|Gen 14:11]], 'best man' ([[BDB#GFM|GFM]]) v[[Gen.14.20|Gen 14:20]]; [[Gen.15.2|Gen 15:2]]; [[Gen.15.6|Gen 15:6]] more generally ***friends*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אחים‎</span>) [[2Sam.3.8|2Sam 3:8]]; [[Prov.19.7|Prov 19:7]]; [[Prov.12.26|Prov 12:26]] is dubious, Död [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#De|De]] and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְעֵהוּ‎</span>; Toy conjectures possibly <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(יָסֻר) מֵרָעָה‎</span>, see further <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תור‎</span>.
